UPDATE_YOUR_DATA_HERE_IF_SOMETHING_CHANG: Update your data here if something changed
FILL_IN_YOUR_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX_QUESTIO: Fill in your personal income tax questionnaire
PLEASE_COMPLETE_YOUR_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX: Please complete your personal income tax questionnaire, We ask that you fill it in correctly so that we can complete your personal income tax return.
CLICK_HERE_TO_FILL_IN_YOUR_QUESTIONNAIRE: Click here to fill in your questionnaire
NAME: Name
PLEASE_ENTER_A_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address
PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN_AT_LEAST_EIGHT_CHA: Password must contain at least eight characters, at least one number and both lower and uppercase letters and special characters
AUTH_FAILED: JWT - Auth-Token not set in header
CREATE_DATA: Something went wrong while creating data
DELETE_DATA: Something went wrong while deleting data
DELETE_USER_ID: Something went wrong while delete user id
DUPLICATE_CUSTOMER_AND_FIRM_ID: Duplicate customer id and firm id
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXIST: Email address already taken please use another email address
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Email not verified please request for otp verification
FILE_TYPES: Only png,jpeg,svg and gif images are allowed
GET_DATA: Something went wrong while getting data
GET_FIRM_DETAILS: Something went wrong while getting firm details
GET_PTI_LINK_DETAILS: Something went wrong while getting PTI link
INVALID_OTP: Invalid otp please try to verify again
NEW_PASSWORD_MATCH_WITH_OLD: New password same as old password
OLD_PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Old password does not match with current password
ONBOARDING_COMPLETED: Your onboarding is completed please signIn
OTP_EXPIRED: Otp expired please request for resend
PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH_PLEASE_RE_ENTER_YOUR_: Please enter your password again since it does not match.
RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Reset password token is expired please try again
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong, we're working on it.Please try again later after some time
THIS_EMAIL_IS_ALREADY_TAKEN_PLEASE_CHANG: This Email is already taken please change the email and try again
TOKEN_EXPIRED: Invite token is expired please contact your account firm for new invite
UPDATE_DATA: Something went wrong while updating data
USER_DISABLED: User account is disabled please enable it first
USER_INFORMATION_HAS_BEEN_SUCCESSFULLY_U: User information has been successfully updated.
USER_NOT_FOUND_WITH_ASSOCIATION: User not found with associated customerId
USER_NOT_FOUND_WITH_ASSOCIATION_FIRM: User not found with associated firmId
VERIFICATION_CODE_SEND_TO_YOUR_EMAIL_ADD: verification code send to your email address
CONTACT_YOUR_ACCOUNTANT_TO_INVITE_YOU: Contact your accountant to invite you
KAMIGO_AIM: Kamigo aims to assist enterpreneurs in the day-to-day management of their businesses. Kamigo supports Accounting Firm {{firm}} with personal income tax.
SIGN_IN_KAMIGO_AIM: Kamigo aims to assist enterpreneurs in the day-to-day management of their businesses.
LOGIN_WITH_DETAILS: Log in with your details and complete your personal tax questionnaire. Your accountant will then work on your information.
CREATE_QUESTIONNAIRE: Create your personal account and complete your personal tax questionnaire.
PRIVACY_AND_SECURITY: We consider your privacy and security very important. To access your questionnaire, we ask you to create an account.
ASSIST_YOU: To assist you in this, we have already filled in your name and e-mail address for you. Please enter a password and create your account. You will then be able to access your questionnaire.
SCAN_QR: Scan the QR code in your authenticator app
SORRY_TOKEN_INVALID: Sorry, this token appears to be invalid or expired.
PLEASE_CONTACT_ACCOUNTING_FIRM: Please contact your accountant to request a new invitation.
ASSOCIATED_ACCOUNTS_NOT_FOUND: Sorry we didn't find any associated accounts
FIRM_AFFILIATION: if you have a firm affiliation, please contact your accounting firm
FORGOT_EMAIL: Forgot your password? Fill in your e-mail and we will send you an e-mail if we have your account on record.
FILL_THE_FORM_TO_RESET_YOUR_PASSWORD: Fill the form to reset your password
RESET_PASSWORD_INFO: Create a new password to secure your account. Your password should be at least 8 characters long, include both uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Avoid using easily guessable information like your name or birthdate. Once you've entered and confirmed your new password, click 'reset your password button' to save it.
CREATE_A_NEW_PASSWORD_FOR_YOUR_ACCOUNT: Create a new password for your account
ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND_MESSAGE: Your account may have been deleted. If you would like to access your account, please contact your accountant.
DELETE_PROFILE_MESSAGE: Are you sure to delete your account?
TYPE_DELETE: Type DELETE to delete your account
MANAGE_PROFILE_INFO: Manage your public profile and private information
SECURITY_INFO: Manage your password and 2-step verification preferences
DELETE_INFO: Delete your profile information from the Kamigo panel
ENABLE_TFA_DIS: Protects you against password theft by requesting an authentication code via SMS on every login.
TFA_DIS1: You have two-factor authentication set-up on your account for added security.
TFA_DIS2: Open the authenticator app on your registered device to access the 6-digit code.
